website_summaries.verdict: The 808 Audio Ear Canz is one of the first exercised-focused Bluetooth earphones we've seen with both solid performance and a truly affordable price tag.
pros: Plenty of eartip and fin options to ensure a secure fit
cons: Easy to accidentally skip tracks using the inline remote

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: Very happy. Sync immediately once switched on. No connection issues. Great battery life. Only issue is the tips/wings for the ear buds are either too big or too small.
customer_reviews.author: Not Jack

customer_reviews.title: 6 hour battery life is a LIE!!!
customer_reviews.text: First pair, battery life lasted at most 3.5 hours even though it says 6 hours. Two months later, battery died within half an hour on a full charge. Had to get Fitbit to replace it, thank god for warranty! Second pair - same issue. Battery lasts maximum 3 hours. Currently shopping around for a pair of Bluetooth earphones that aren’t sh*t in some way or another.
customer_reviews.author: Flemeny cricket

customer_reviews.title: Best in class
customer_reviews.text: This is my first product review ..but Fitbit flyer deserved it..Fitbit flyer are the best fitness headphones i ever used..great sound ,battery life is enough for a long gym sessios around 3 4 hours with boost sound mode on and around 7 8 hours in off mode..no connectivity issues..great headphones,i really recommend !
customer_reviews.author: BogdanBuhus

customer_reviews.title: Terrible build quality, built to fail.
customer_reviews.text: Terrible quality as per all Fitbit products. I've had these for almost 2 years. The rubber securing the earbuds to the cables literally disintegrates and the plastic around the battery/volume control is all warped and loose. Just spend £20 on some half decent other brand and don't waste your money thinking these are high quality.
customer_reviews.author: B. Morgan

customer_reviews.title: The battery doesn't keep long time
customer_reviews.text: It is the second pair I've ordered thinking I was unlucky with the first. The battery doesn't stay charged as much as they advertised... They were fully charged and after half an hour if listening music I was advised the battery is half...
customer_reviews.author: 🤪 FALIMENT 🤪

customer_reviews.title: Great sound.
customer_reviews.text: I love these, great sound and battery life. Range isn't brilliant but I use them when exercising, so phone usually on me. Little pouch to keep them in and plenty of adjustments to get the perfect fit. Slightly pricey though.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon McNamee

customer_reviews.title: Great set of headphones
customer_reviews.text: Works brilliantly with my devices, they take a short while to charge and can honestly say I have not had a problem with the little cover for the charging port, it stay put when replaced...love them!
customer_reviews.author: WestieLover

customer_reviews.title: Best fitting in ear headphones
customer_reviews.text: I tried many brands (Jabra, Bose, etc) and by far these were the best fitting and offered good sound quality. Only negatives that I have are that fitbit do not sell replacement earbuds (eventually they will fall off and if you are unlucky they will get lost). 2nd negative is the annoying voice over "you have 1 hour battery time remaining".
customer_reviews.author: Ziggy

customer_reviews.title: Lasted a couple of years, then died.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty poor quality device.... worked ok for a couple of years and then wouldn’t turn on. I tried Fitbit support, and nothing helped. I was informed that the warranty period is over.... and advised to buy a new one! No chance. £109 for something that doesn’t last more than 2-3 years is really poor.
customer_reviews.author: customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Sounds
customer_reviews.text: Battery life is very good and there are a choice of ear buds to fit
customer_reviews.author: AB M.

customer_reviews.title: Battery life not good!!
customer_reviews.text: The in ear fit took some adjusting and getting used to, but managed after a while changing up the attachments. The battery life however was awful, I could get just about 2 hours out of a full charge, no where near what is advertised by Fitbit. Ended up returning them due to this which is a shame as the sound quality and look of them was great.
customer_reviews.author: Gemma

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely shocking headphones, on pair number 2 in 2 ...
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely shocking headphones, on pair number 2 in 2 months and now they have become defective. They have this uncanny knack of never turning on. Don't do any kind of activity that causes you to sweat as this seems to be the root cause of the issue
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately these were very disappointing. The headphones charged but then would not turn on. Apparently there is a faulty batch and this is a common problem. I sent them back and quickly received a refund from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy Neale

customer_reviews.title: Ionic might not be awesome but Flyer definitely is!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing sound quality, gorgeous design, battery lasts really well. I'm thrilled with mine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use perfect for exercising
customer_reviews.text: Fit nicely and are comfortable, won’t fall out with a few options and sizes of ear buds.
customer_reviews.author: alex

customer_reviews.title: Fab ear phones
customer_reviews.text: Top job for the gym, battery life okay, could be better but great sound quality.
customer_reviews.author: Gadgetman

customer_reviews.title: Great Headphones!
customer_reviews.text: Looked at a number of Bluetooth/Wireless headphones & decided on the Flyers. Delighted with them as they work perfectly with my Fitbit Ionic...... Excellent product 👍
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good but earbuds do fall out when running
customer_reviews.text: Works well & easy to connect but ear buds aren’t the best fit & do fall out which is irritating
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: USB CHARGING PORT
customer_reviews.text: I've only had these for about 4 hours!... They little rubber stoppee for the charging point keeps falling out! It's really annyoing. As I've paid alot of money for them and it shouldn't do this....
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Katchi

customer_reviews.title: Sound Quality | fitting was not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: I had problems getting this headphone to fit into my ear but they kept falling off. The sound quality was really poor.
customer_reviews.author: OneKey Gadgets

customer_reviews.title: Hard to keep in ears
customer_reviews.text: Find these earphones hard to keep in my ears for exercise, despite all the different fittings and the sound quality isn't great for such an expensive pair. Bit disappointing because I love my ionic. Think ear hook phones would have been a better design to go with this fitness tracker.
customer_reviews.author: Ipc Ltd

customer_reviews.title: Avoid
customer_reviews.text: The worst set of Bluetooth earphones I have purchased by some distance. I have only minted to sync the earphones once in over a week of trying. The earbuds themselves aren’t the most secure and are prone to falling out. First negative review I have ever written ibut such is the level of my dissatisfaction
customer_reviews.author: Supersub

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The "Flyer" broke after one week, I have been in touch constantly with "FitBit" direct and now they want me to send them to the USA so they can perform a "technical inspection" which means I'll be without the Flyer for over a month. Not what should be expected from Fitbit tbh, feel very let down by the support and the purchase
customer_reviews.author: Gary Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Average at best
customer_reviews.text: I have many Bluetooth headphones. These are nowhere near as good as others. Plus Good sound, quality is consistent and has depth. Negatives Fall out, a lot! No so good for workouts as the makers would have you think. Most importantly, bearing in mind these are created to compliment the fitbit ionic, they, unlike the ionic, are not ixp8 standard and therefore are only only splashproof. They cannot be submerged so can’t be used for swimming, which the ionic can be. On the whole, for the money, disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: S. Collins

customer_reviews.title: Poor battery life
customer_reviews.text: Not a very good earphone. Battery life is extremely bad, you'd be lucky to get an hour on full charge making them not very good for using during a workout. Sound quality is good and they are comfortable though.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: They have great bass which is perfect for exercise
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised by the quality of these headphones! They have great bass which is perfect for exercise. There is also a boost mode which you can use to increase the bass further when you need more motivation! They're also great for exercise and stay in place while running. Highly recommend :-)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great headphones they stay put during exercise. Very easy to connect to fitbit watch or phone.
customer_reviews.author: Wahda

product_meta.title: Fitbit Unisex Flyer Wireless Headphones
product_meta.description: Hear what moves you with Fitbit flyer-the ultimate wireless headphone for fitness. Take on tough workouts with a design that's sweatproof and durable. Stay motivated by playing your favourite songs for up to 6 hours with premium wireless audio and powerful bass. And optimise your comfort, security and sound quality with customisable ear tips, wings and fins. Battery - Playtime: Up to 6 hours, Charging Time: 2 hrs, Quick Charge: 15 minutes charge = 1 hour playtime, Charging: micro-USB. Works with: Android, iOS & Windows smartphones, Windows & OSX computers, A2DP Bluetooth mono & stereo devices. Bluetooth 4.2
feature_bullets: Secure, comfortable fit with interchangeable ear tips, wings and fins
Durable and sweatproof with protective hydrophobic nano coating
Premium wireless audio delivers crisp sound and powerful bass
Up to 6 hours playtime, plus quick charge

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.7 out of 5 stars203 ratings3.7 out of 5 stars
